com.daro.persistence.generic.dao

Class GenericDaoImpl<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.daro.persistence.generic.dao.GenericDaoImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Data type expected in query return as entity
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDao<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersonEntityDaoImpl, PersonPersistence

    @Repository
public abstract class GenericDaoImpl<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericDao<T>
    Generic DAO Implementation Implements persistence in a data source using a Hibernate Session Factory.
    Author:
    Dario Palminio
